awards.text: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 3 wins.

fullplot: Deals with the intolerably hard life of a family of four, the only inhabitants of a very small Japanese island in the Setonaikai archipelago. Several times a day they row over to the neighboring island to fetch water for their miserable fields.
plot: A family of four are the sole inhabitants of a small island, where they struggle each day to irrigate their crops.
title: The Naked Island
